mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT (ID, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, DETAILED_ADDRESS, ZIP, STATUS, ROLE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, BLOG_URL) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{detailedAddress}, #{zip} ,#{status}, #{role}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{blogUrl})

INSERT INTO ACCOUNT (ID, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, STATUS, ROLE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, BLOG_URL) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email} ,#{status}, #{role}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{blogUrl})
